item.title: Trichrome Technique
item.description: Trichrome is a method of taking colour photography using different coloured filters (usually red, blue and green) to form a complete image. It was invented by Louis Ducos du Hauron in the late 19th century. It is most commonly used in black & white film photography to create atmospheric images, however the technique is usable with digital photography as well. Â How does it work?
